Keywords: Cosmic , Deity , Herald , Past
Real Name: Norrin Radd
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
I BURN PIECE BY PIECE: Silver Surfer starts the game with 4 Light tokens. // FREE: Remove a Light token. If you do, this turn Silver Surfer can use Pulse Wave and KNOCKBACK and, when he uses KNOCKBACK, he may place them up to 6 squares away instead of 3.
A SILVER BLADE OF COSMIC POWER: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Giant Reach: 3. // When Silver Surfer makes a close attack, you may remove a Light token. If you do, opposing characters can't use Probability Control and can't reduce damage below 1 for this attack.
I RETURN...IN THE BLACK: STOP. Super Senses. Silver Surfer can't be healed. // When this power is first revealed, remove all Light tokens and heal another friendly character that many clicks.
Figure Errata
Changed "I Burn Piece by Piece"

May 24, 2022
GL_Alex
He's going to be amazing in golden age matches. Fantastic Herald of Galactus (+1 stats: 20 Def/12 PB/5 damage Prob/13 RS) BCF back end of the dial and then Shape Change? NICE.
December 23, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
Fun dial, not super effective in his point range, but still damn fun. On his top click he'll be pretty menacing with his 19DF and Prob, but once he's off of that he'll presumably crumble pretty quickly. It's crazy that we've gotten so many amazing Norrins in the past 1.5 years that this guy is potentially the worst of the bunch
December 8, 2021
Goop
You know this guy looks kind of fun. You Running shot in and Pulse Wave and knock everyone back SIX squares. Thats kinda cool, too bad knockback damage isn't a thing anymore. Kind of a waste to do that with a 150pt figure but fun i'm sure. He's ok.
